WorkItem.Description: V2.3.23 is missing adding in the expertise contributed by Veteran of the Third War talent (Blood).  2.3.22 is calculating fine, but expertise is off by 6 in .23. Verified that Strength & Stamina change with addition of talent points in Veteran, but Expertise does not change at all. Optimization is therefore not working correctly as it thinks I'm not Expertise capped.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Expertise Not Including Veteran of the Third War (Blood)

Comments.Message:
This is not accurate.  I just checked.  V3W hasn't changed in months, the code has Expertise in it, and my blood spec shows differences in expertise when I change the values of this talent.



** Closed by Shazear 9/25/2010 12:30 PM

Re-opening, and attaching xml file for my toon.  Rawr shows 24.89 expertise.  In game I have 30.  If I untalent within Rawr, I still show 24.89 expertise.  Working my way back down the Blood talent tree until I get to V3W, it makes no impact on the Expertise value (remains @ 24.89).

2.3.22 shows my Expertise @ 30.89.  Doing same process with untalenting with 2.3.22 reduces Expertise to 24.89.  When I get to V3W, it increases Expertise from 24.89 to 26.89 to 28.29 to 30.89.  2.3.23 doesn't do this for me.
ahh... This is for DPSDK, not Tank.  It's working in Tank, but yes, it's broke in DPS.
Thank-you.  I should have clarified it was DPS from the beginning.
